description.en: Only a true Matador of great skill can earn this Cloak. This cloak will raise your Speed 15%, your Parry 10, and your DEF +1.
description.ar: Only a true Matador of great skill can earn this Cloak. This cloak will raise your Speed 15%, your Parry 10, and your DEF +1.
description.br: Apenas um verdadeiro Matador de grande habilidade pode ganhar esta capa.
description.cns: 只有真正技艺高超的斗牛士才能获得这件披风。移动速度+15%，闪避+10，防御 +1。
description.de: Nur ein exzellenter Matador kann sich diesen Umhang verdienen. Dieser Umhang erhöht deine Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit um 15%, deine Parrierrate um 10 und deine DEF um 1.
description.fi: Only a true Matador of great skill can earn this Cloak. This cloak will raise your Speed 15%, your Parry 10, and your DEF +1.
description.fil: Only a true Matador of great skill can earn this Cloak. This cloak will raise your Speed 15%, your Parry 10, and your DEF +1.
description.fr: Seul un vrai toréador peut obtenir cette cape. Cette cape augmente votre vitesse de 15%, vos chances de parrer de 10 et votre DEF de 1.
description.id: Hanya Matador sejati dengan keterampilan hebat yang bisa mendapatkan Cloak ini. Cloak ini akan meningkatkan Speed 15%, your Parry 10, and your DEF +1 Anda.
description.it: Only a true Matador of great skill can earn this Cloak. This cloak will raise your Speed 15%, your Parry 10, and your DEF +1.
description.jp: 優れたスキルを持つ者だけが手に入れることができる、マタドールマント。スピード+15％、回避率+10%、DEF+1が上昇します。
description.kr: 실력이 뛰어난 투우사 만이이 망토를 얻을 수 있습니다. 이 망토는 속도 15 %, Parry 10, 방어력 +1을 올립니다.
description.nl: Only a true Matador of great skill can earn this Cloak. This cloak will raise your Speed 15%, your Parry 10, and your DEF +1.
description.pl: Only a true Matador of great skill can earn this Cloak. This cloak will raise your Speed 15%, your Parry 10, and your DEF +1.
description.ru: Отныне все будут знать, что вы одолели тысячу леден… страшных, опасных рогаликов и спасли Мадригал от гибели!
description.sp: Solo un verdadero matador de gran habilidad puede ganar esta capa. Esta capa aumentará tu Velocidad de Movimiento un 15%, tu Desvío en 10 y tu DEF en 1.
description.sw: Only a true Matador of great skill can earn this Cloak. This cloak will raise your Speed 15%, your Parry 10, and your DEF +1.
description.th: เฉพาะ Matador ที่มีทักษะที่ยอดเยี่ยมเท่านั้นที่จะได้รับเสื้อคลุมนี้ เสื้อคลุมนี้จะเพิ่มความเร็วของคุณ 15%, Parry 10 ของคุณ และ DEF +1 ของคุณ
description.tw: 鬥牛士的披風，移動速度+15%，迴避+10和防禦力+1
description.vi: Chỉ một Matador thực sự có kỹ năng tuyệt vời mới có thể kiếm được Áo choàng này. Chiếc áo choàng này sẽ tăng 15% Tốc độ của bạn, Parry 10 và DEF +1 của bạn.
